basics.name: Tarun Telang
basics.label: Engineering Manager • Technical Lead • Blockchain & PropTech Expert
basics.summary: Visionary Engineering Manager with 20+ years of experience leading distributed teams and architecting scalable platforms. Expert in blockchain technology, Web3 development, and enterprise system architecture. Proven track record of delivering high-impact products from concept to scale, with deep expertise in real estate technology, fintech platforms, and decentralized systems. Strong background in Agile/Scrum methodologies, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps practices.

work.name: Lets Practice Academy
work.summary: Leading technology strategy and engineering teams for EdTech platform with blockchain integration and AI-powered features
highlights: Architected and delivered blockchain-based certification system with NFT credentials, enabling secure and verifiable digital certificates
Led distributed engineering team of 15+ developers across frontend, backend, and blockchain specializations
Implemented smart contracts for automated course completion verification and revenue sharing with educators
Designed scalable microservices architecture handling 100K+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime
Established DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 75%
Integrated AI/ML recommendation engine improving user engagement by 45%
Managed technical budgets and resource allocation for $1.5M+ development initiatives

work.name: Highspot
work.summary: Led engineering teams developing enterprise SaaS platform with advanced analytics and AI-driven insights
highlights: Managed engineering teams of 12+ developers in fully remote, distributed environment across multiple time zones
Architected and delivered AI-powered content analytics platform processing 10M+ documents daily
Implemented real-time data pipeline architecture enabling instant insights for enterprise sales teams
Led technical strategy for platform scalability supporting Fortune 500 customers with multi-million user bases
Established security best practices and compliance frameworks for enterprise data handling
Drove adoption of cloud-native technologies reducing infrastructure costs by 40%
Mentored senior engineers and technical leads, with 80% promotion rate within the team

work.name: OYO

Established technical standards for security, compliance, and data privacy in hospitality sector
Collaborated with global product and business teams to define multi-year technology roadmap

work.name: Polycom

Led technical architecture decisions for video collaboration systems serving millions of concurrent users
Implemented enterprise integration solutions including Salesforce.com connectivity and third-party APIs
Established engineering processes and quality standards improving team productivity by 35%
Drove technical decision-making for complex enterprise platform requirements
Mentored engineering teams on distributed systems design and scalability best practices

work.name: Polycom
work.position: Senior Staff Engineer - Video Collaboration Platform
work.summary: Architected and developed enterprise video collaboration solutions with focus on system integration
highlights: Architected RealPresence Touch video collaboration control solution establishing technical foundation for enterprise adoption
Designed and implemented enterprise system integrations enabling seamless interoperability with business platforms
Developed continuous integration processes and automated testing suites improving code quality and release velocity
Contributed to technical architecture decisions for scalable video collaboration platform serving global enterprises
Implemented security and compliance frameworks covering accessibility and open source governance
Delivered technical solutions for complex enterprise video collaboration requirements

work.name: SAP Labs India

Collaborated with global teams on enterprise software architecture and design patterns
